rules.natural: Under the condition that the employee has a desk, the employee sits at a workstation.
Either the employee has a desk or the employee works remotely.
The employee works on a project or the employee works overtime.
Under the condition that the employee works overtime, it is not the case that the employee drinks coffee.
If the employee completes a task, the employee attends a meeting.
Provided that the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee completes a task.
Whenever the manager approves of the employee, then if it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee gets a bonus.
If the employee has a monitor, then the employee uses a computer.
If the employee is promoted, it is not the case that the employee is fired.
The employee drinks coffee or, if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, it is not the case that the employee gets a bonus.
If it is not the case that the employee is employed by the company implies that if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor, then the employee is fired.

facts.natural: The manager approves of the employee.
The employee is employed by the company.
The employee does not use a computer.
It is not the case that the employee attends a meeting.

Provided that the employee has a desk, then the employee uses a computer.
It is not the case that the employee has a desk.

(A1 → A2).natural: Provided that the employee has a desk, then the employee uses a computer.

(A1 → A3).natural: If the employee has a desk, the employee has a monitor.

(A1 → A4).natural: Under the condition that the employee has a desk, the employee sits at a workstation.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the employee has a desk or the employee works remotely.

(A10 → A12).natural: Whenever the employee works on a project, the employee completes a task.

(A10 → A13).natural: If the employee works on a project, then the employee meets the deadline for the project.

(A10 → A9).natural: Provided that the employee works on a project, the employee attends a meeting.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: The employee works on a project or the employee works overtime.

(A11 → ¬A8).natural: Under the condition that the employee works overtime, it is not the case that the employee drinks coffee.

(A12 → A9).natural: If the employee completes a task, the employee attends a meeting.

(A13 → A12).natural: Provided that the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee completes a task.

(A15 → (¬(A10 → A13) → A14)).natural: Whenever the manager approves of the employee, then if it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee gets a bonus.

(A3 → A2).natural: If the employee has a monitor, then the employee uses a computer.

(A4 → A3).natural: Under the condition that the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor.

(A5 → (A4 → A3)).natural: Provided that the employee is employed by the company, then if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor.

(A7 → ¬A6).natural: If the employee is promoted, it is not the case that the employee is fired.

(A8 ∨ (A4 → A3)).natural: The employee drinks coffee or, if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor.

(A9 ∨ ¬A8).natural: The employee attends a meeting or it is not the case that the employee drinks coffee.

(¬(A10 → A13) → A14).natural: If it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee gets a bonus.

(¬(A10 → A13) → ¬A14).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, it is not the case that the employee gets a bonus.

(¬(A5 → (A4 → A3)) → A6).natural: If it is not the case that the employee is employed by the company implies that if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor, then the employee is fired.

A15.natural: The manager approves of the employee.
